main event: Multiple witnesses observed a silver oblong object low in the sky over Newburgh, N.Y. in August 1957.
interesting points: The object was partially obscured by trees but lit up the area beneath it like moonlight,The object remained stationary for 15-25 minutes before disappearing abruptly,The observed object was described as killing bright white on the bottom and dark on the top,It was estimated to be about 200-300 feet large,The observer reported that the object appeared to be shaped like a toy top before it became cigar-shaped.
